item.description: This is a group energy clearing you will love.  RYSE focuses on the chakras, aura, male/female balance and more.  RYSE brings about your next level of harmony, health and wholeness. Expect to feel more peaceful, balanced, present and joyful. Event runs untill 8:30pm. Bring friends! A mini lecture lets you know what happens during the clearing, then you sit with eyes closed and receive. Class runs 7-8:30 pm. Everyone loves it! For more information on RYSE and upcoming offerings from A Higher Balance, please visit www.ahigherbalance.com
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find us in the Hawthorne Bldg directly over Starbucks. Enter at the door next to H&R Block and then the elevator to the 2nd floor.
item.name: Full Moon RYSE Group Energy Clearing - Aug. 9
